_comment: DRE Guardian v1.0 - Production Template Manifest
_description: This manifest defines the epistemic contract between stakeholders and the governance engine. Each assertion binds a human anchor (owner_role) to a quantified uncertainty (PERT distribution).

assertions.description: Q1 2026 revenue projection with market uncertainty

distribution._interpretation: Optimistic scenario (max) reflects 20% upside from new customer acquisition. Pessimistic (min) accounts for 15% downside from delayed contracts.

_gates_tested.freshness: last_updated must be within sla_days of current date
_gates_tested.stability: baseline_value must remain within [min, max] range
_gates_tested.alignment: current Excel value must overlap with PERT distribution (overlap > 5%)
_gates_tested.structure: cell B5 must exist and contain numeric data

_usage_instructions.1_customize: Edit project_id, project_name, and target_file to match your Excel model
_usage_instructions.2_add_assertions: Add assertions for each critical input in your strategic model
_usage_instructions.3_set_sla: Configure sla_days based on your team's update frequency
